content.title: Infection
content.description: Infection is a condition caused by harmful microorganisms invading the body, requiring prompt diagnosis and treatment.

content.title: Bleeding
content.description: Severe or uncontrolled bleeding requires immediate attention to prevent shock or other serious complications.

content.title: High Fever
content.description: A high or persistent fever can indicate a serious infection or illness and may need urgent care.

content.title: Severe Pain
content.description: Uncontrolled or sudden severe pain may signal an emergency and should be evaluated quickly.

content.title: Breathing Issues
content.description: Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing can be life-threatening and requires urgent care.
